KnowledgeItem.Title: WordPressWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for handling WordPress install related packages by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding data blocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock WordPressWorkflowHandlePKG and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow.

Activate.XMLExtract:

				TargetMachine=${WPWHP:TargetMachine}

				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
